node.title: Visualizing CyBOK References with D3
node.summary: Using the D3 graphing library to visualise all references within the Cyber Security Body of Knowledge

node.title: How to execute terminal commands with your voice on Linux
node.summary: Proof of concept use of the open source NLP tool 'voice2json' to execute arbitrary commands in a linux terminal

node.title: Scan to Listen
node.summary: Article on the development of a React Native mobile app Scan to Listen, for scanning books to find audiobooks on Audible and scanning CDs and vinyl to find albums on Spotify
